attributes.action: stop cold calling from overseas businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to petition that cold calling from overseas businesses be outlawed. It is a nuisance and the amount of cold calling per day is excessive. The most vulnerable such as pensioners are at risk of signing up to things that they are unsure about. Please find a way to outlaw these business practices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
